name: Blair Witch Project: Episode 3 - Elly Kedward Tale
name_original: Blair Witch Project: Episode 3 - Elly Kedward Tale
description:
Blair Witch Project: Episode 3 - Elly Kedward Tale is an action-adventure game developed by Ritual Entertainment. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Gathering of Developers. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Blair Witch Project: Episode 3 - Elly Kedward Tale is available on PC.
